医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
产妇肥胖和肥胖合并其他危险因素与死产风险增加相关CMAJ 最近的一项研究比较了两个类别的肥胖母亲的死产风险。一个人仅将肥胖作为危险因素，而另一个人则有未确诊的或其他影响怀孕的高风险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Maternal-obesity-and-obesity-with-other-risk-factors-are-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-stillbirth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Maternal-obesity-and-obesity-with-other-risk-factors-are-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-stillbirth.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e39becf-e498-40dc-be36-cf1240a5b89c Tue, 05 Mar 2024 09:00:00 -0500 Maternal obesity and obesity with other risk factors are associated with an increased risk of stillbirth
国际委员会审查有关蓝光暴露对健康影响的相互矛盾的证据多年来，科学家们一直对过度暴露于短波长光（SWL）（包括智能手机、笔记本电脑和平板电脑的“蓝光”）潜在的不利健康影响表示担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/International-commission-examines-conflicting-evidence-on-health-effects-of-blue-light-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/International-commission-examines-conflicting-evidence-on-health-effects-of-blue-light-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ee36a06-aa3d-41ac-9ebb-5073600e2132 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:57:05 -0500 International commission examines conflicting evidence on health effects of blue light exposure
举报人指控美国最大的独立初级保健网络 Aledade 医疗保险欺诈马里兰州一家负责监管全国最大独立初级保健医疗网络的公司正面临举报人诉讼，指控该公司使用“操纵”计费软件使患者病情看起来比实际情况更严重，从而欺骗了医疗保险医疗保险数百万美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Whistleblower-accuses-Aledade-largest-US-independent-primary-care-network-of-Medicare-fraud.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Whistleblower-accuses-Aledade-largest-US-independent-primary-care-network-of-Medicare-fraud.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=086645ed-f247-4380-bb55-dd0e03d7af7f Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:17:31 -0500 Whistleblower accuses Aledade, largest US independent primary care network, of Medicare fraud
统计模型与一线工作人员：谁最了解如何使用阿片类药物结算现金？在这座墨西哥湾沿岸城市，成瘾医学医生斯蒂芬·劳埃德 (Stephen Loyd) 在 1 月份的一次活动中宣布，州和地方政府将花费数十亿美元用于阿片类药物解决基金，他称之为“游戏规则改变者”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Statistical-models-vs-front-line-workers-Who-knows-best-how-to-spend-opioid-settlement-cash.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Statistical-models-vs-front-line-workers-Who-knows-best-how-to-spend-opioid-settlement-cash.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c3c4045-c219-4839-9a19-f33e1c76428b Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:15:46 -0500 Statistical models vs. front-line workers: Who knows best how to spend opioid settlement cash?
FDA 批准贝克曼库尔特生命科学 DxFLEX 流式细胞仪https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/FDA-Clears-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-DxFLEX-Flow-Cytometer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/FDA-Clears-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-DxFLEX-Flow-Cytometer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18b2a1f9-f23b-4d1a-9530-1fb2895867fb Tue, 05 Mar 2024 06:48:00 -0500 FDA Clears Beckman Coulter Life Sciences DxFLEX Flow Cytometer
Exonate 一流滴眼液 Ib/IIa 期试验数据证明治疗糖尿病视网膜病变和糖尿病黄斑水肿的安全性和生物活性EXN407 是第一个外用 SRPK1 抑制剂，作为这些适应症的单一疗法，既具有安全性，又具有生物反应信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Exonate-first-in-class-eye-drop-Phase-IbIIa-trial-data-demonstrate-safety-and-biological-activity-in-treatment-糖尿病视网膜病变和糖尿病黄斑水肿.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Exonate-first-in-class-eye-drop-Phase-IbIIa-trial-data-demonstrate-safety-and-biological-activity-in-treatment-糖尿病视网膜病变和糖尿病黄斑水肿.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=409a32fd-9776-4db6-9724-6d6a9dae92b1 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 04:50:00 -0500 Exonate first-in-class eye drop Phase Ib/IIa trial data demonstrate safety and biological activity in treatment of diabetic retinopathy and diabetic macular oedema
随着越来越多的孩子采用绿色饮食，研究敦促谨慎行事并制定指导方针研究人员强调了高收入国家儿童植物性饮食的兴起，探讨了健康结果，并敦促制定统一的饮食指南，以减轻营养缺乏和生长问题等风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Study-urges-caution-and-guidelines-as-more-kids-go-green-with-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Study-urges-caution-and-guidelines-as-more-kids-go-green-with-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30d58665-2769-4b8a-81ed-8edcff3ee511 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 23:20:00 -0500 Study urges caution and guidelines as more kids go green with diets
新方法简化了从成纤维细胞生产肢体祖细胞的过程在一项合作研究中，九州大学和哈佛医学院的研究人员发现了可以转变或“重新编程”成纤维细胞的蛋白质：皮肤和结缔组织中最常见的细胞 -；转化为与肢体祖细胞具有相似特性的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/New-method-simplizes-product-of-limb-progenitor-cells-from-fascinated.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/New-method-simplizes-product-of-limb-progenitor-cells-from-fascinated.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a4ccadb-474d-4155-9d2e-105965ac1248 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 22:50:00 -0500 New method simplifies production of limb progenitor cells from fibroblasts
低出生体重和 20 岁时体重超重导致早期 2 型糖尿病风险急剧上升今年在意大利威尼斯举行的欧洲肥胖大会 (ECO)（5 月 12 日至 15 日）上发表并发表在 Diabetologia（欧洲糖尿病研究协会 [EASD] 杂志）上的新研究表明，低体重出生体重以及成年早期（但不是儿童期）超重会导致男性早年（59 岁或以下）患上 2 型糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Early-type-2-diabetes-risk-skyrockets-with-low-birthweight-and-overweight-at-age-20.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Early-type-2-diabetes-risk-skyrockets-with-low-birthweight-and-overweight-at-age-20.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=693794e6-b5b2-4641-97fa-12ae4b537084 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 22:41:56 -0500 Early type 2 diabetes risk skyrockets with low birthweight and overweight at age 20
哺乳期母亲的新冠肺炎加强剂可以为婴儿提供抗体佛罗里达大学食品与农业科学研究所 (UF/IFAS) 的一项研究显示，接种了 COVID-19 加强疫苗的哺乳期母亲会通过母乳将抗体传给孩子，并可能保护太小而无法接种疫苗的婴儿佛罗里达大学医学院发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/COVID-booster-in-lactating-mothers-can-provide-antibodies-for-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/COVID-booster-in-lactating-mothers-can-provide-antibodies-for-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f04ca4ee-7578-416d-ac83-348db63ebc11 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 22:36:41 -0500 COVID booster in lactating mothers can provide antibodies for infants
